author: Ingus Drulle

changelog.release_notes:
Enriched event display - now it shows up to 4 events
Added option to select date format for events
Added charging animation (battery is full when animation stops)

Added option to show seconds.
Added option to show weather status info.
Fixed 12h style time format for event start-end times.
Improved stability of warning when lost connection with Smartwatch Pro app.

Bug fix - absurd temperature and thunderstorm icon on failed request of weather info.
Bug fix - weather info update after BT connection restored.

Added - All-day event show/hide functionality (beta version).
Added possibility to select date format.
Added persistent memory cache feature and auto time format 12/24h.

description:
The best watch face when you need glance of iPhone calendar's on your wrist.
Showing up to 4 upcoming events (update every 10 minutes). 
Weather and temperature of current location (don't forget to enable location in Smartwatch Pro) from http://openweathermap.org (update every 20 minutes).
Battery level with 10% increments and charging animation (animation stops when battery is completely full).

Other features:
Lost bluetooth connection warning (with vibration).
A lot of date and time format options. 
Show/hide All-day events, seconds, weather update status.

Feel free to comment, pass suggestions... and set Like :)

latest_release.release_notes:
Enriched event display - now it shows up to 4 events
Added option to select date format for events
Added charging animation (battery is full when animation stops)

title: Busy day
